resources.string: Connection Error!! Check if you have internet connectivity and try again.

Its been around five years now since Bangalore saw its first Barcamp. Over this period, the city’s flagship technology unconference has brought together hundreds of professionals who have participated in dozens of sessions to share their insights on cutting edge technologies.


With the success of the Barcamp format, we have seen the emergence of several other exciting unconferences targeting a range of technology niches. In this changed context, we are seeking to create a uniquely useful space for geeks to come together while perfectly complementing similar events in the city.


For BCB, we request that participants submit topics prior to the event to ensure that a majority of a session is devoted discussions. We also hope that BCB’s venue at SAP Labs will encourage spontaneous and open-ended interaction among participants like last time.

 Head to http://barcampbangalore.org for more info.
